Eclipse 3.2 Ant Build Notes

RC2 - April 28, 2006

Problem Reports Fixed

137088: StringIndexOutOfBoundsException in AntLaunchDelegate.appendProperty()
73814: AntEditorContentOutlineTests.testParsingOfNonValidFile fails on Xerces
138089: pathelements for project dependencies are syntactically incorrect

RC 1 - April 13, 2006

Problem Reports Fixed

134932: support retrieving the path from AntElementNode
133380: Polish of the Ant preference page
134303: Fix broken NLS strings
135765: need to adopt ICU4J APIs
132339: Update the External Tools launcher wizard to use a PNG image
136480: Performance improvement for the AntModel

3.2 M6 - March 30, 2006

Problem Reports Fixed

106803: Ant launcher not setting working directory
111740: Ant editor shows text in black and white until file is edited
107721: Ant fails to detect when default JRE changes
133184: Create markers for Ant build using javac
124405: Migrate ant launch configs to support resource filtering
128493: Organize manifests
133190: Namespace support for the Ant extension points

March 14, 2006

Problem Reports Fixed

130751: NPE creating build.xml file
131421: debug as ant build ignores global user property

March 7, 2006

Problem Reports Fixed
